connector.description: Store and retrieve Java objects from an SQL database using JOOQ.

camel.sink.endpoint.databaseConfiguratio.name: camel.sink.endpoint.databaseConfiguration
camel.sink.endpoint.databaseConfiguratio.description: To use a specific database configuration

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: Type of operation to execute on query One of: [EXECUTE] [FETCH] [NONE]

camel.component.jooq.configuration.name: camel.component.jooq.configuration
camel.component.jooq.configuration.description: Component configuration (database connection, database entity type, etc.)

camel.component.jooq.databaseConfigurati.name: camel.component.jooq.databaseConfiguration
camel.component.jooq.databaseConfigurati.description: To use a specific database configuration

camel.component.jooq.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.jooq.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.jooq.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.jooq.operation.name: camel.component.jooq.operation
camel.component.jooq.operation.description: Type of operation to execute on query One of: [EXECUTE] [FETCH] [NONE]

camel.component.jooq.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.jooq.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.jooq.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
